about_the_game:
This isn't your average ARPG. Defend portals, shift bodies, and shape a world where your choices echo.

Counter relentless waves of invaders with cunning strategy, not just brute force. Every character, every backstory, ties into a living world – your choices will change it all.



Innovative Gameplay Mechanics: Dominate a battlefield that rewrites the rules. Defense IS your offense as you protect portals against unstoppable foes. Master the art of body-shifting: inhabit different characters, seize their powers, and create endless combat strategies that evolve with every fight.



A Universe with Depth: Unravel a living story where each character holds pieces of the puzzle. Ally, enemy, or something in between – their secrets drive the conflict as much as your skill. This isn't some loot-grind treadmill; your choices ripple through the world, shaping fates as much as the outcome of every battle.

Character-Driven Experience: Experience the world through multiple lenses. Dive into the lore and unique powers of a diverse cast. Bonds forged, lives changed – this journey isn't just about leveling up, it's about the connections you make along the way.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features adult content, including violence and blood, which may not be suitable for all players. It is recommended for mature audiences only.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows® 10 version 1909 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5-2500K or AMD™ FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or AMD Radeon™ R9 280 or Intel® Arc™ A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows® 10 version 1909 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5-4670K or AMD™ R3-1300X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ RX 470 or Intel® Arc™ A380
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: A fallen hero reborn, your soul seeks a new vessel. Choose from six mighty champions and inherit their strength against encroaching darkness. Master brutal combat, strategize your build, and manage resources wisely. This fast-paced ARPG delivers the haunting beauty of dark fantasy and an epic lore.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Dutch, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
